title: need help
body: im playing wukong top vs darius and somehow i cant seem to farm because we are both melee and whenever i try to farm he gets into a 1v1 with me and i lose. what should i do?

replies.body: As a {{champion:122}} main I would say just build armor and health really, most darius players tend to build lots of health really early so laning can be a pain. With the next patch though his q will have a slight delay so dodging that might be a bit easier....

Build heavy Armor and Health also, maybe rush banshees?
Or just get a lot of ganks, but ganks wont matter once he's lvl 6 in the next patch
